body_html:
@jamestwebber I can certainly create my own repo containing the optimizer code. I think it should work okay if this is a separate module which users are to install (but it might be tricky to match against the correct version of pytorch in the future). My only issue is that I couldn't figure out a nice way to integrate with the pytorch tests.

@soumith Have you made a decision based on my response above?

@jamestwebber I can certainly create my own repo containing the optimizer code. I think it should work okay if this is a separate module which users are to install (but it might be tricky to match against the correct version of pytorch in the future). My only issue is that I couldn't figure out a nice way to integrate with the pytorch tests.

@soumith Have you made a decision based on my response above?
